movies.title: Dara O'Briain: This Is the Show
movies.plot: 'Dara O Briain' - This Is the Show was recorded in front of a sell-out crowd on the final date of his record-breaking nine nights at the world famous Hammersmith Apollo. Dara is on top form as he effortlessly mixes off the cuff audience interaction with razor sharp material and a star studded finale that almost puts Hollywood to shame.
movies.simplePlot: 'Dara O Briain' - This Is the Show was recorded in front of a sell-out crowd on the final date of his record-breaking nine nights at the world famous Hammersmith Apollo. Dara is on top form...

biography.bio: Dara O'Briain was born on February 4, 1972 in Wicklow, Ireland. He is a producer and writer, known for Mock the Week (2005), The Apprentice: You're Fired! (2006) and Dara O Briain: School of Hard Sums (2012). He has been married to Susan since 2006. They have two children.
biography.name: Dara O'Briain

biography.bio: Jimi Mistry was born in 1973 in Scarborough, Yorkshire, England. He is an actor and writer, known for Blood Diamond (2006), Coronation Street (1960) and RocknRolla (2008). He has been married to Flavia Cacace since December 28, 2013. He was previously married to Meg Leonard.
biography.name: Jimi Mistry

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Richard Hills yet.
biography.name: Richard Hills

biography.bio: Peter Dickson was born on June 23, 1957 in Belfast, Northern Ireland as Peter Henry Cochrane Dickson. He is known for his work on The X Factor (2004), Live at the Apollo (2004) and The 5 O'Clock Show (2010). He has been married to Barbara Patricia since 1981. They have two children.
biography.name: Peter Dickson

filmingLocations.location: Hammersmith Apollo, Hammersmith, London, England, UK
